snippet: DigitalGlobe said GeoEye’s $792 million hostile bid undervalued the satellite imaging company.
abstract: Satellite imaging company DigitalGlobe rejects a $792 million takeover offer from rival GeoEye, saying the hostile bid undervalues the company.
lead_paragraph: DigitalGlobe said GeoEye’s $792 million hostile bid undervalued the satellite imaging company.

headline.seo: DigitalGlobe Rejects Takeover Bid From GeoEye
headline.main: Satellite Firm Spurns Bid for Takeover From Rival
headline.print_headline: Satellite Firm Spurns Bid For Takeover From Rival
